# scLNC

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of scLNC is to investigate lncRNA function in single-cell RNA-seq.

## Installation

You can install the development version of scLNC from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("xgaoo/scLNC")
```
